ExampleDefinition.Title: Drag Area to Zoom
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates zooming of SciChart by dragging an area: Overlays two series on a SciChartSurface and applies the RubberBandXyZoomModifier. This is a built-in ChartModifierBase derived class which adds the behavior of zooming when you mouse-drag an area. Uses secondary Y-Axis to demontrate zooming with multiple axes
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Drag Area to Zoom</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Showcases how to add zooming to a SciChartSurface using the RubberBandXyZoomModifier. This ChartModifier can be restricted in the X-Axis only (in which case the Y-Axis autoranges according to RubberBandXyZoomModifier.AutoRangeY), or unbounded, in which case it zooms to the exact rectangle you draw.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Also try double-clicking to zoom to extents. This feature is provided by the ZoomExtentsModifier.</Run>
